alert.note: Alert for Kimble; Menard; Schleicher; Sutton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 9:46PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN SCHLEICHER... NORTHERN KIMBLE...MENARD AND NORTHEASTERN SUTTON COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 PM CDT... At 943 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms in eastern Schleicher and Sutton Counties, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Menard, Yates Crossing, London, Saline, Hext, Fort Mckavett, , Cleo, Us-83 between Menard and Junction, Camp Sol Mayer, Us-377 east of Junction, and Us-190 in Menard County. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 448 and 454. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
